item.title: SSH

item.title: Firewalls on Linux
item.description: firewalld Firewall. ufw AKA uncomplicated firewall; a firewall config tool running on top of iptables. Common with Ubuntu-based distros (e.g. Linux Mint).

item.title: Deploying EC2 with... everything.
item.description: Let‚Äôs get straight to business. What do we want to do? Deploy an AWS EC2 instance in a fantastically diverse collection of ways. Not including clicking through things in a web UI (that‚Äôs cool but too slow and too easy, thus very boring) nor especially pulling an untrustworthy LLM-generated YAML or Bash script from Amazon Q itself (or loose sequence of 3 commands, to be more precise).

item.title: Grafana
item.description: Grafana Grafana creating monitoring dashboards based on data from endpoints provided to it. It‚Äôs like a ‚Äúfrontend‚Äù for monitoring data scraper tools such as Prometheus, DataDog, CloudWatch and so on.

item.title: Minikube & K8s basics

item.title: Prometheus
item.description: Prometheus Prometheus is a tool for collecting data for monitoring purposes. Basically it‚Äôs one of the ‚Äúbackend options‚Äù for monitoring visualization tools such as Grafana.

item.title: cURL cheatsheet
item.description: cURL cheatsheet Use a custom loopback interface (e.g. 127.1.2.3): curl --interface 127.1.2.3 -v http://127.57.57.57:8057/ Index of helpful links Everything curl.
